## Welcome to Class!

Welcome to Managerial Statistics. I am looking forward to learning statistics with you. This is the TL;DR for the class, where I'll outline some of the key expectations and policies. Please make sure to also read the class syllabus, which you'll find on the next page.

## Key Points About This Class:

- **Course Schedule:** This course is scheduled for session A of Fall 2024, running from September 3, 2024, to October 21, 2024. **All work must be completed by Friday, October 25, 2024.**
- **Lecture Videos:** Weekly lecture videos will be published throughout the class.
- **One-on-One Help:** I will be available for one-on-one help sessions via Zoom. To schedule an appointment with me, use this link: <a href="http://tiny.cc/DrKelly" target="_blank">http://tiny.cc/DrKelly</a>.

## Before Class You Should Do the Following:

- Ensure you have the latest release of Zoom on your computer.
- Test your audio and video setup by running a [Zoom meeting test](https://zoom.us/test){target="_blank"}.
- Register for a free Posit.Cloud account. Register here: [https://posit.cloud/plans/free](https://posit.cloud/plans/free){target="_blank"}.
- Read all the emails I send you!
- Join the Posit.Cloud class workspace using this link: [Posit.Cloud Workspace](http://tiny.cc/ECON730-WORKSPACE "ECON730-WORKSPACE"){target="_blank"}.
- Join the assignment work group using this link: [Assignment Work Group](http://tiny.cc/ECON730-ASSIGNMENT).

## Technology Requirements

You will need the following to complete this class:

- A computer with internet access. A tablet or Chromebook may not be sufficient to complete all class activities.
- Reliable broadband internet service.
- A microphone and web camera.

If you need help getting set up for classes, please let me know.
